snippet: The Knicks’ J. R. Smith, the league’s Sixth Man Award winner, had knee surgery on Monday and could miss the start of the N.B.A. season.
abstract: New York Knicks guard J R Smith undergoes knee surgery and could miss the start of the 2013 NBA season.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks’ J. R. Smith, the league’s Sixth Man Award winner, had knee surgery on Monday and could miss the start of the N.B.A. season.

headline.main: Operation Could Delay Season for Knicks’ Smith
headline.print_headline: Operation Could Delay Season For Smith
